title: Social Interaction-Based Learning Engagement Program to Overcome War Trauma

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of PTSD symptoms and experience adapting to educational environments
context.additional_context: A program to enhance educational effectiveness by promoting social interaction in a smartphone-based online environment for pre-service teachers experiencing war-induced PTSD symptoms and reduced learning engagement.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of PTSD symptoms on learning engagement (emotional, cognitive, and behavioral).
Learners can improve learning engagement by 30% or more through real-time online discussions and collaborative activities.
Learners can develop personalized trauma response strategies and apply them to learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
